original_text:
“If my land has cried out against me
    and its furrows have wept together,
korean_text: 만일 내 밭이 나를 향하여 부르짖고 밭이랑이 함께 울었다면

sentences.original_text: If my land has cried out against me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내 땅이 나를 거슬러 부르짖었다면

sentences.original_text: and its furrows have wept together
